xxl.description: To be used only in Hero Banners

mbold.description: To be used for large items, such as page titles, large navigation items

sbold.description: To be used for medium items, such as section titles, small card titles, chart titles

xsbold.description: To be used for the smallest highlighted items, such as small section titles, etc

mregular.description: For all the body of the app

mbold.description: For all the highlighted items of body of the app

sregular.description: For all the smaller informational items in the body of the app

sbold.description: For all the smaller informational items that need to be highlighted in the body of the app

xsregular.description: For the very fine details in the body of the app

xsbold.description: For the very fine details in the body of the app that need to be highlighted

xs.description: To be used ONLY on button labels.

s.description: To be used ONLY on button labels.

m.description: To be used ONLY on button labels.

l.description:
This style should never be used outside of a table cell.
It applies to the larger labels of items in the first row.

mregular.description:
This style should never be used outside of a table cell.
It applies to the Default labels of items of the first line of a cell.

mbold.description:
This style should never be used outside of a table cell.
It applies to highlighted items of the first line of a cell.

sregular.description:
This style should never be used outside of a table cell.
It applies to default item of the second line of a cell.

sbold.description:
This style should never be used outside of a table cell.
It applies to highlighted items of the second line of a cell.

xsnotional.description: To be used on indvidual numbers and values that need to be highlighted. Not to be used in tables.

xs.description: To be used on indvidual numbers and values that need to be highlighted. Not to be used in tables.

s.description: To be used on indvidual numbers and values that need to be highlighted. Not to be used in tables.

m.description: To be used on indvidual numbers and values that need to be highlighted. Not to be used in tables.

xl.description: To be used on indvidual numbers and values that need to be highlighted. Not to be used in tables.
